title: Transformative Pedagogy in East African Classrooms
abstract: An evidence-informed framework for inclusive, student-centered learning in resource-constrained secondary schools.

title: Teacher Mentorship Models for Rural Education Systems
abstract: Comparative analysis of mentorship structures and their impact on teacher retention and instructional quality.

title: Assessment Reform and Learning Outcomes in Rwanda
abstract: A policy-practice bridge report proposing classroom-centered assessment tools for meaningful progress tracking.
